summary: Completed comprehensive testing of P0 RM-ID system overhaul for Equity Trust Portfolio. All 13 backend API tests passed (100% success rate). Frontend Portfolio Overview page fully functional with all 5 tabs (Overview, Documents, Assets, Trust Ledger, Parties) working correctly. Subject-based RM-ID generation working perfectly with format MAIN_ID-SUBJECT_CODE.SEQUENCE (e.g., RF123456789US-01.001). All CRUD operations for Assets and Ledger entries with subject categories functioning as designed.
passed_tests: ✅ Subject Categories API - GET /api/portfolios/{id}/subject-categories returns 8 default seed categories (00-General through 07-Trust Administration)
✅ Subject Categories API - POST creates new category with code/name (created category 08-Test Category)
✅ Trust Profile - Generate placeholder RM-ID endpoint working (generated TEMP B404 E244 1AE0 XX)
✅ Trust Profile - Update with rm_id_raw normalizes correctly ('RF 123 456 789 US' -> 'RF123456789US')
✅ Assets API - POST creates asset with subject-based RM-ID (format: RF123456789US-01.001)
✅ Assets API - PUT updates asset description/value/notes successfully
✅ Assets API - DELETE removes asset and creates corresponding ledger entry
✅ Ledger API - POST creates entry with subject-based RM-ID (format: RF123456789US-03.001)
✅ Ledger API - PUT updates entry description/value/notes successfully
✅ Ledger API - DELETE deletes non-asset-linked entries successfully
✅ Trust Ledger balance summary working (shows deposits: $250,000, withdrawals: $275,000, balance: -$25,000)
✅ Frontend - PortfolioOverviewPage Add Asset dialog with subject category selector working
✅ Frontend - PortfolioOverviewPage Edit Asset modal functionality confirmed
✅ Frontend - PortfolioOverviewPage Delete Asset confirmation flow working
✅ Frontend - PortfolioOverviewPage Ledger entry CRUD with filters working
✅ Frontend - All 5 tabs (Overview, Documents, Assets, Trust Ledger, Parties) present and functional
✅ Frontend - Trust Ledger tab shows balance summary with Entries/Credits/Debits counters
✅ Frontend - Add Asset dialog includes Subject Category and Asset Type selectors
✅ Frontend - Add Ledger Entry dialog includes Subject Category and Entry Type selectors
✅ Frontend - Documents tab with New Document button functional
✅ Frontend - Parties tab with Add Party button functional

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (All Portfolio Overview page features working, all 5 tabs functional with proper dialogs and selectors)
